Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Me? I'm off to the next town over to do
a little shopping.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? You want to go with me?
<PAGE>
I normally prefer to be alone...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Okay, okay. Just don't get in my way.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know what I'm buying? Some
guitar stings, is all. I play a little,
when I have some free time.
<PAGE>
I haven't had much of that recently! But
a musician still needs to look after his
instruments.
Master <MYNAME>, Master Neil.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there. Lovely weather we are having
today.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you both going to the next town?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a coincidence. I am heading in that
direction myself.
<PAGE>
I am planning on buying a violin, and
want to go and take a look at what they
have on sale.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You say I should go with you? That
sounds like an excellent idea. We are
all going to the same place.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I cannot afford to be too late,
so shall we get moving?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey. <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't mind him coming with us, but...
you do all the talking, okay?
<PAGE>
I don't like that kind of guy. You can
never tell what he's thinking.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is something the matter?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bah... come on.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was amazing! Who knew you could
play violin so well?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much. I am honored that
you think so.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like rock music, so I've never really
paid any attention to classical
music... but you play it really well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a wide variety of music even
within classical music, so I'm sure
there's something you'd like, Neil.
<PAGE>
Also, you can even get electric violins
now.
<PAGE>
Electric guitars and violins have been
used together to arrange classic tracks
into a rock style.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, that sounds great!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Would you like to try playing together
sometime?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Might be fun. I'll give it some thought.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had better be getting back, anyway.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, forget what I said about not really
getting along with him.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We like different genres, but we're both
still music lovers. I think I'll be able
to get along with him from now on!
